title: New: Ottilia â€“ Siren
content:
Ottilia has been gone for what feels like an age.

Having cropped up on these pages almost a year ago to the day, the Swedish songstress is back with another enchanting track. Siren maintains the stripped back, slightly rough round the edges feel of her early demos, whilst still relying on her uniquely powerful voice. Check out Siren below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
